remarks: A choice-free order equivalent to the Noetherian condition on a closure system.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
statement:
isnacs3 $p |- ( C e. ( NoeACS ` X ) <-> ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ A. s e. ~P C ( ( toInc ` s ) e. Dirset -> U. s e. s ) ) ) $.
$d C s $.
$d C s $.
$d X s $.
$d X s $.
